title: Why are so many people in France angry about pension overhaul?
description: Protests intensify against President Emmanual Macron's plans to raise the retirement age.

title: Israeli defence minister calls for halt to judicial overhaul
description: As mass protests grip Israel, Yoav Gallant says the dispute over the measures pose a threat to the country's security.

title: Russia’s nuclear arsenal: How big is it and who controls it?
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced a deal to deploy tactical nuclear weapons to Belarus.

title: Putin announces deal to deploy nuclear weapons in Belarus
description: Russian president says deal struck with Belarusian counterpart would not violate nuclear nonproliferation agreements.

title: Brazil’s Lula postpones China trip after catching pneumonia
description: The president's health has been a source of concern in recent years after he was diagnosed with throat cancer in 2011.

title: Thai PM Prayuth Chan-ocha to run for re-election
description: The former general has been in power since 2014 and is running with the new United Thai Nation Party.

title: Qatari Sheikh Jassim submits new bid for Man United: UK media
description: The banker has placed a second-round offer for the English football giants, UK media report.

title: Ukraine ‘managing to stabilise’ situation around Bakhmut
description: Ukrainian military's top commander says his forces are pushing back Russian assault on city in the Donbas region.

title: At least 23 killed in Mississippi tornado, storms
description: The death toll is expected to rise as search and rescue efforts continue across storm-stricken areas.

title: Gordon Moore, Intel co-founder and Moore’s Law author, dies at 94
description: Moore, a modern technological transformation pioneer, helped companies bring more powerful chips to smaller computers.

title: It is time to phase out fossil fuels
description: We call on world leaders to come together and commit to start phasing out fossil fuels immediately.

title: India’s Gandhi promises to fight on after removal as MP
description: Leader of India's Congress party was stripped of his seat after he was convicted of defamation over a remark on PM Modi.

title: US lawsuit takes aim at ‘weapon of choice’ for stalkers
description: Cheriena Ben is among plaintiffs in a US class-action lawsuit alleging Apple AirTags facilitate stalking and violence.

title: Trump: Indictment, incitement … 2024 candidate?
description: Trump uses the possibility of an arrest to fundraise and rile up his base. Plus, the squeeze on Nicaragua's journalists.

title: LGBTQ+ dating app Grindr warns Egypt users of police-run accounts
description: Grindr says police are using fake accounts and taking over real accounts from members who have been arrested.

title: Is the US Fed right about raising interest rates?
description: The US Federal Reserve raised interest rates again to rein in inflation, despite the turmoil in the financial sector.

title: Former F1 champion Piquet fined for Hamilton racist comments
description: Brazil’s Nelson Piquet used racist, homophobic language against Lewis Hamilton, the sport's only Black driver.

title: Large asteroid to zoom between Earth and Moon
description: On Saturday, the 2023 DZ2 will come within a third of the distance from the Earth to the Moon.

title: Nordic countries plan joint air defence to counter Russian threat
description: The commander of the Danish air force says the combined Nordic fleet is comparable to 'a large European country'.

title: Myanmar’s military jet fuel supplies hit by latest US sanctions
description: US Treasury Department sanctioned two people and six entities linked to military regime's atrocities, air campaigns.

title: Austrian FM: Russia’s war in Ukraine is not ‘black and white’
description: Foreign Minister Alexander Schallenberg discusses Austria's military non-alignment policy.

title: France bans ‘recreational’ use of TikTok, Twitter, Instagram
description: France joins a growing list of states that say TikTok lacks sufficient levels of cybersecurity and data protection.

title: Russia puts Putin’s ex-speechwriter on wanted list over Ukraine
description: Abbas Gallyamov wrote speeches for Vladimir Putin during the Russian leader's 2008-12 time as prime minister.

title: Joe Biden says no sign yet of China sending Russia weapons
description: Ex-President Medvedev quotes threatening 1941 Stalin message to urge more weapons production by Russia's arms industry.

title: Afghanistan beats Pakistan for first time in T20I cricket series
description: Afghanistan and Pakistan met seven times in total with Pakistan always coming out on top - until the match on Friday.

title: Pro-Iranian forces in Syria warn US of response to air strikes
description: President Joe Biden said US 'does not seek conflict with Iran' but would respond 'forcefully' to attacks on US forces.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 395
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 395th day, we take a look at the main developments.
